Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ControllerTest.GameHandlerStub, GodSelectionControllerTest.GameHandlerStub, TurnControllerTest.GameHandlerStub
public class GameHandler
extends java.lang.Object
GameHandler class handles a single match, instantiating a game mode (Game class) and a main controller (Controller class). It also manages the startup phase, like the marker's color selection.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameHandler

      public GameHandler​(Server server)
      Constructor GameHandler creates a new GameHandler instance.
      Parameters:
      server - of type Server - the main server class.

  • Method Details

    • isStarted

      public int isStarted()
      Method isStarted returns if the game has started (the started attribute becomes true after the challenger selection phase).
      Returns:
      int - the current game phase.

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber​(int playersNumber)
      Method setPlayersNumber sets the active players number of the match, decided by the first connected player.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - of type int - the number of the playing clients.

    • setupPlayer

      public void setupPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, int clientID)
      Method setupPlayer receives a nickname from the server application and creates a new player in the game class.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of type String - the chosen nickname, after a duplicates check.
      clientID - of type int the - client unique id generated from server.

    • getCurrentPlayerID

      public int getCurrentPlayerID()
      Method getCurrentPlayerID returns the current player client ID, getting it from the currentPlayer reference in the Game class.
      Returns:
      the currentPlayerID (type int) of this GameHandler object.

    • singleSend

      public void singleSend​(Answer message, int id)
      Method singleSend sends a message to a client, identified by his ID number, through the server socket.
      Parameters:
      message - of type Answer - the message to be sent to the client.
      id - of type int - the unique identification number of the client to be contacted.

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll​(Answer message)
      Method sendAll does the same as the previous method, but it iterates on all the clients present in the game. It's a full effects broadcast.
      Parameters:
      message - of type Answer - the message to broadcast (at single match participants' level).

    • sendAllExcept

      public void sendAllExcept​(Answer message, int excludedID)
      Method sendAllExcept makes the same as the previous method, but it iterates on all the clients present in the game, except the declared one.
      Parameters:
      message - of type Answer - the message to be transmitted.
      excludedID - of type int - the client which will not receive the communication.

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Method setup handles the preliminary player setup phase; in this phase the color of workers' markers will be asked the player, with a double check (on both client and server sides) of the validity of them (also in case of duplicate colors).

    • getController

      public Controller getController()
      Method getController returns the main game manager controller.
      Returns:
      the controller (type Controller) of this GameHandler object.
      See Also:
      for more information.

    • getServer

      public Server getServer()
      Returns:
      the server class.

    • makeAction

      public void makeAction​(UserAction action, java.lang.String type)
      Method makeAction handles an action received from a single client. It makes several instance checks. It's based on the value of "started", which represents the current game phase, in this order: - 0: color phase - 1: challenger phase; - 2: players select their god powers; - 3: board worker placement; - 4: the game has started.
      Parameters:
      action - of type UserAction - the action sent by the client.
      type - of type String - the action type.

    • workerPlacement

      public void workerPlacement​(WorkerSetupAction action)
      Method workerPlacement handles the worker placement phase by checking the correctness of the user's input and if the selected cell is free or occupied by someone else.
      Parameters:
      action - of type WorkerSetupMessage - the placement action.

    • challengerPhaseChoose

      public void challengerPhaseChoose​(ChallengerPhaseAction userAction, java.lang.String godSelection)
      Method challengerPhaseChoose handles the second game phase: the user chooses his god card. If he is in the wrong turn phase (checked by the "started" int value) an error message in created and sent to the client, who is requested to send another command.
      Parameters:
      userAction - of type ChallengerPhaseAction - the action of the current player.
      godSelection - of type String - the selection of the god card.

    • challengerPhase

      public void challengerPhase​(UserAction action)
      Method challengerPhase handles the challenger game phase (based on the listener message). It triggers the correct method relying on the started value.
      Parameters:
      action - of type UserAction - the action to be performed

    • unregisterPlayer

      public void unregisterPlayer​(int id)
      Method unregisterPlayer unregisters a player identified by his unique ID after a disconnection event or message.
      Parameters:
      id - of type int - the unique id of the client to be unregistered.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(java.lang.String leftNickname)
      Method endGame terminates the game, disconnecting all the players. This method is invoked after a disconnection of a player. It also unregisters each client connected to the server, freeing a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      leftNickname - of type String the nickname of the player who left the game.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Method endGame terminates the game, disconnecting all the players. This method is invoked after a player has won. It also unregisters each client connected to the server, freeing a new lobby.
